tasks.title: Create comprehensive test suite for untested lib modules
tasks.description:
Develop unit tests for 6 untested modules to achieve 90%+ coverage:

**UNTESTED MODULES:**
- agentRegistry.js (used by initialize-agent.js)
- buildRecoveryManager.js
- distributedLockManager.js (critical - used by taskManager.js)
- jestHooks.js
- sessionFileTracker.js (used by fileOperationLogger.js)
- testEnvironmentRecovery.js

**SUCCESS CRITERIA:**
- Unit tests for all 6 modules with 85%+ line coverage each
- Integration tests for modules with dependencies
- All new tests pass consistently
- Overall lib/ directory coverage reaches 90%+

**PRIORITY MODULES:**
1. distributedLockManager.js (HIGH - core business logic)
2. agentRegistry.js (HIGH - agent management)
3. sessionFileTracker.js (MEDIUM - logging dependency)
4. buildRecoveryManager.js (MEDIUM - recovery logic)
5. jestHooks.js (LOW - test infrastructure)
6. testEnvironmentRecovery.js (LOW - test utility)

tasks.title: Fix Jest coverage collection contamination issues
tasks.description:
Resolve Jest coverage collection failures caused by JSON contamination in node_modules:

**ISSUE:**
- Coverage collection fails with syntax errors in node_modules files
- Istanbul lib modules being contaminated with JSON content
- Test execution succeeds but coverage reporting blocked

**ROOT CAUSE:**
- Contamination protection system is interfering with Jest coverage
- Files in node_modules/istanbul-lib-report/, node_modules/exit/ contain invalid JSON

**SOLUTION REQUIREMENTS:**
- Create contamination-safe coverage collection method
- Implement alternative coverage calculation approach
- Ensure coverage reports can be generated without contamination
- Maintain test isolation during coverage collection

**SUCCESS CRITERIA:**
- Coverage collection completes without syntax errors
- Accurate coverage percentages reported for lib/ directory
- Coverage data available for Strike 3 validation
- Test contamination protection maintained
